author: Manuel Jasso
content:
Hi, I just wanted to send you a note to tell you that I am in complete agreement with you. I think it is even dirty that Fortify used this kind of scare tactics to position themselves and generate business, shame on them.

The security concerns that they raised are valid and serious. I am not bothered by WHAT they say, but HOW they said it: a bunch of poorly grounded assessments.
